Subject: FW: Company Document - Insurance

 

Dear Gents,

 

Kindly note that the current insurance policy for all Radwa Trading premises—including the Real KSA RUH Main Warehouse and the Real KSA RUH Overflow Warehouse—was issued by Gulf Insurance Group on 24/10/2024 under Document No. 1/FA/31130/0/0, Account No. 1037069/0, Business Code 3481/9934, and is valid until 23/09/2025.

 

Please proceed with initiating the renewal process for this policy to ensure timely coverage. Once the renewal is completed, kindly share the updated documents with us.

 

Best Regards,

 

Hamad Alshahrani

 

Senior Associate – QHSE
